name: present boundaries
description:
For more on The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, check out these previews.
The world is populated by time travelers called Link and Zelda who travel from the future of Hyrule to the present, where they are romanced by another boy named Link. These happy endings often include the appearance of a more female Link, which is a cool way of changing the dynamics of the story. This is an update of the original Zelda: Breath of the Wild game for Nintendo Switch. The game has features like a few new dungeons and adds a new story line. The tutorial and the main story mode have also been updated. If you're interested in the details before playing the video game, visit the official website. If you haven't played the original Zelda: Breath of the Wild yet or need some time to experience the sheer world of Hyrule, check out our review to check it out physically and experience the sparkle and charm.
